EmailTemplate.name: Training Exam Invite Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Training__c} Exam Invite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Name_of_Participant__c} , Thank you very much for your participation. You are kindly invited to the {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Training__c} Exam .
You have three 3 chances in total to clear the exam. To start the Exam please click on the below link.
https://c2s.my.salesforce.com/apex/IND_Training_PageReferenceLanding_Page?id={!Learning_Response_Result__c.TrainingId__c}
Regards, Industrial BU Admin
